name: mafft
publications: Katoh, Toh 2010 Parallelization of the MAFFT multiple sequence alignment program. Bioinformatics 26:1899-1900)
Katoh, Asimenos, Toh 2009  Multiple Alignment of DNA Sequences with MAFFT. In Bioinformatics for DNA Sequence Analysis edited by D. Posada Methods in Molecular Biology 537:39-64
Katoh, Toh 2008 Improved accuracy of multiple ncRNA alignment by incorporating structural information into a MAFFT-based framework. BMC Bioinformatics 2008, 9:212
Katoh, Toh 2008  Recent developments in the MAFFT multiple sequence alignment program. Brief Bioinform (2008) 9 (4): 286-298.
Katoh, Toh 2007 Errata PartTree: an algorithm to build an approximate tree from a large number of unaligned sequences.  Bioinformatics (2007) 23 (3): 372-374.
Katoh, Kuma, Toh, Miyata 2005 MAFFT version 5: improvement in accuracy of multiple sequence alignment.  Nucl. Acids Res. (2005) 33 (2): 511-518.
Katoh, Misawa, Kuma, Miyata 2002 MAFFT: a novel method for rapid multiple sequence alignment based on fast Fourier transform. Nucl. Acids Res. (2002) 30 (14): 3059-3066
description: Multiple alignment program for amino acid or nucleotide sequences
